language.entry: Enigma wears aetheric robes and carries a mysterious orb of arcane power, ever since a curse turned his skin to stone his power has grown exponentially. He empowers his abilities and his allies, the longer the fight lasts the stronger the group becomes.
It's not safe to have two of us in the same group.
It's not safe to have two of us in the same group.

Riddles and puzzles are not the only things the Enigma excels at. Using his power, he can increase the group's offensive or defensive capability. His abilities are very versatile, he can empower them in different ways.

Enigma is a patient individual. He stays awake as others rest, he gives his group riddles and puzzles to occupy their minds and relieve their stress. His most iconic thing is creating framents that everyone can use to empower themselves or trinkets that empower him immensely.
I will do what i must.
Create a fragment of power or a trinket for this class.
This should help close your wounds.
Here, I don't need these, I hardly ever bleed.
I don't need these, here you go.
As long as I'm here you will have unimaginable power.
You shouldn't be afraid as long as I'm here.
I'm pretty sure this will all end well.
There is no room for failure! I will protect us!
Look at us, we are unstoppable!
What has a head and a tail, but no body?... A coin.
What gets broken without being held?... A promise.
What is always coming but never arrives?... Tomorrow.
That is something i'm not interested in.
I think i need to meditate instead.
I should have stayed at the Hamlet!
I despise this feeling of fear.
I feel the presence of our enemies.
More of them will be here soon.
We have to hurry, more are coming.
You can do better than that!
Coming here with you was a mistake.
We are not going to survive this.
I will forever be in your debt.
I will take you all on!
Need to move back, the tension is overwhelming.
They are coming, I have to move.
I will give you some time to recover.
I will buy you some time.
Standing here doesn't do us any good.
No, I wont just stand here.
Why does this fear last so long?
If I do that, they will kill me.
They want me to do that!
I am not sure if now is the time.
That cannot be done at the moment.
I don't care about any of this.
There is no need for that.
I am exhausted, i need a moment.
Arcane arts are not easy, give me some time.
I'm pretty sure this is a better idea.
I know what has to be done!
I have waited a long time for this.
I will win this battle for us.
Arcane arts are hard to execute.
I know what spell must be used.
This is better for the current situation.
I am not sure what to do.
I have to do something to stop this fear.
Be very careful, they are near.
We need to hurry this up, i thirsty for a fight.
I'm itching to cast more spells.
You all need to become more resilient.
Coming with you was a bad idea.
I shouldn't be here with all of you.
Without my sorcery, you would perish.
I think i should have lead my own expedition.
I am the reason why we still stand.
I wish we got another curse.
I think it's time to return to the Hamlet.
I don't care what you have to say.
Watch what you say in front of a mystic!
I'm over here, come and get me!
Let's see if you can hurt me!
My arcane arts will end you!
I'm so tired, cannot go further.
What is the meaning of this?
Why leave? They are waiting for us!
More are waiting outside, we shouldn't retreat.
This needs to be our end!
This is where our path ends.
No, we need to stay and fight!
We are no cowards, fight on!
They knew what i was going to do?!
That cannot happen and somehow it did...
Get out of my way, i need some room.
This will almost certainly end badly...
There is no hope for us.
This is what you wanted, isn't it?
I knew that was going to happen...
How do you let that happen?
It's not smart to stay and fight, if we know the risk is high.
I know that they are up to something.
We are failing because of you!
I refuse to believe that just happened.
This is a very suspicious situation.
Can someone remind me why we are making the same mistakes twice.
We should move the other way.
We are about to be attacked.
You have no idea where we are going, don't you?
Why are we going this way again?
I am so tired of this journey.
No, i am not using that.
That is exactly what they want.
That will not make a difference.
Rather not, the outcome will still be the same.
I don't need help to survive.
That is not a good idea.
I do not need special care.
Healing me will not change anything.
Healing me won't help us at all.
I do not like that plan.
I will heal, when i want to heal.
I don't need empowerment right now!
This isn't the time, they are surrounding us!
My gut tells me i should fight!
That will not change the outcome!
That will not make a difference.
No, I know what I'm doing, leave me be.
No, I will not do that.
You are no match for me!
This is not a good place to rest.
Fear is such a fascinating emotion.
That sound cannot be a good sign.
We need to hurry up, our next battle awaits.
I knew coming here was a bad idea.
Today is a very sad day.
I need some time to recover.
I'm having a hard time focusing.
I feel we should abandon this quest.
I know for a fact they are planning something.
I don't like how you are all looking at me.
I should have stayed in the inn.
Can i have some silence, please.
Like that will make a difference.
I like your enthusiasm, but that doesn't change a thing.
We live because of my esoteric sorcery.
I am always the reason groups survive.
I wish i could taste food.
I don't need that much food.
I would rather pass on food.
We need to get this over with quickly.
Being fed won't help us win battles.
This does not help us one bit.
We are all here for a lost cause.
I don't think i should eat right now.
Alright, i guess i will eat.

에니그마는 천계의 예복을 입고 불가사의한 마력을 지닌 구체를 가지고 다닙니다. 저주는 그의 몸을 돌로 만들어 버렸지만, 또한 그의 힘을 기하급수적으로 강력하게 만들었습니다. 그는 스스로와 동료들을 강화할 수 있으며, 덕분에 전투가 지속될 수록 그들은 강해집니다.
우리 둘이 만나면 무슨 일이 생길지 모른다.
우리 둘이 만나면 무슨 일이 생길지 모른다.
에니그마가 오직 수수께끼와 퍼즐에만 능통한 것은 아닙니다. 마력을 자유자재로 다루는 힘을 이용하여 동료들을 다양한 방식으로 지원하며 공격과 수비 능력을 강화해 줍니다.
에니그마는 참을성이 강합니다. 동료들이 쉬는 동안에도 깨어있으며, 그들의 정신을 차지하고 스트레스를 해소하기 위해 다양한 수수께끼들을 제공합니다. 또한 동료들을 강화하기 위해 파편을 만들어 내거나, 스스로를 각성시키는 장신구를 만들어 낼 수도 있습니다.
강력한 파편이나 에니그마의 장신구를 무작위로 찾아냅니다.
나는 피를 흘리지 않는 존재, 내겐 필요없는 것들이다.
나의 힘에 의지하면 두려울 것이 없다.
나의 수호 아래, 실패할 수 없다.
한없이 가까워지지만 결코 도달할 수 없는 곳은...? 내일.
더 잘 할 수 있었지 않느냐!
내가 나설 때가 아닌 것 같다.
잠시 멈춰서 힘을 재충전 해야 한다.
무엇을 해야 할 지 알고 있다!
누가 나에게 신경이라도 써 주긴 하느냐?
내 마력이 아니었다면 진작 숨이 끊어졌을 것이다.
나 혼자 떠나는 것이 차라리 낫겠다.
지금 물러서면 더 많은 적을 상대하게 될 뿐이다.
어디로 가야하는 지는 알고 움직이는 것이냐?
그런 것 없이도 이길 수 있다.
별로 좋은 생각이 아닌 것 같구나.
별로 쉴 만한 장소는 못 되는구나.
그러게 내가 오지 말자고 하지 않았느냐.
노력은 가상하다만, 별 도움은 되지 않는구나.
내 비전 마술이 아니었다면 여기까지 오지도 못했을 것이다.
우리들 중에서는 나밖에 쓸모있는 존재가 없구나.
맛을 느낄 수 있었다면 좋았을 텐데.
배불리 먹는다고 전투에서 이기는 건 아니지 않느냐.
우리가 여기 온 이유가 있긴 한 것이냐?
谜团穿着乙太法袍，带着充满了奥术之力的法球，自从诅咒将他的皮肤化为岩石之后，他的力量便急剧增长。他强化自己的能力以及他的队友，战斗持续越久，队伍全队也会越强大。
我们不擅长跟同行的合作
我们不擅长跟同行的合作
谜语谜题都是谜团所擅长的。他的力量可以强化队伍全体的攻防，而且强化的方式也很全面，各方各面也能顾及。
谜团十分有忍耐。他在其他人都休息时依然清醒，他会分享谜题与拼图给队友以此减轻他们的压力和训练他们。他最具特色的能力就是创造自己使用的饰物或可被任何人使用的力量晶元，这些晶元可用来强化身体能力。
创造1个力量晶元或者「谜团」专用饰品
这应该有助于治愈伤口
拿去吧，我不需要。我不太会流血
我不需要这些，拿去用吧
只要我在这里你将拥有难以想象的力量
只要我在这里，你就无需害怕
我确定这一切都会好起来的
没有失败的余地!我会保护大家!
瞧瞧我们的阵容，我们是不可阻挡的!
不必害怕我的玄术力量!
什么东西有头和尾，但没有身体?…一枚硬币
什么都不干能破坏什么?…承诺
什么东西总是要来但永远不会到来?…明天
这种感觉什么时候停止?
很快就会有更多的人来这里
我们得快点，更多的人来了
和你们一同前行真是倒霉
需要退后，局势紧张，敌人势不可挡
我需要时间来恢复战力
我会分散他们的注意力!你们…
我会引起他们的注意.快走…
我会给你争取一些时间恢复.快…
我需要重组我的护身法术!
我给你们争取些时间.快.
站在这里对我们没有好处
不，我不能只是傻傻站在这里，我不能
恐惧让我的身体不听使唤!
为什么这种恐惧会持续这么久?
如果我那样做，他们会杀了我
我不确定现在是不是时候干这个事
我累了，我需要一点时间休息
施展奥术不容易，给我点时间准备
我敢肯定还有更好的主意
触觉，痛楚...给我，给我更多的痛苦!
我为了这个时机，已经等了很久了
我将代表我们赢得这场战斗，胜点，我拿下了
让我想想，咒语，咒语是什么?
这个决定更有益于目前的战局
无时无刻的恐惧让我身心疲惫
为什么这种恐惧不会结束?
我必须做些什么来阻止这种恐惧
我渴望施展更多的法术
你们都需要变得更有韧性
跟你一起去是个坏主意
我不应该和你们在一起
没有我的魔法，你就会死去
我想我应该领导这个远征军，而不是某个蠢货
我就是我们仍然坚持战斗的支柱
希望我们能有另一个诅咒
我想是时候回到小镇了
你在神秘之力面前说什么!
我太累了，不能再往前走了
为什么要离开？他们在等我们!
越来越多的人在周围徘徊，我们不能就这样撤退
这是我们的目的地，我们的归宿!
我们不是懦夫，继续战斗吧!
我们快点把它们干掉吧!
恐惧，真实让人感到恐怖…
还有更多的攻击，这次不算什么!
这不可能发生，为什么会这样…
别挡路，我要独自呆一会儿，为什么我的队友这么…
没有下一次了，再这样下去我们都得死…
我们完了，这次远征结束了…
这就是你想要的，不是吗?
为什么你要这么做，你有什么阴谋?

Enigma wears aetheric robes and carries a mysterious orb of arcane power, ever since a curse turned his skin to stone his power has grown exponentially. He empowers his abilities and his allies, the longer the fight lasts the stronger the group becomes.
It's not safe to have two of us in the same group.
It's not safe to have two of us in the same group.

Riddles and puzzles are not the only things the Enigma excels at. Using his power, he can increase the group's offensive or defensive capability. His abilities are very versatile, he can empower them in different ways.

Enigma is a patient individual. He stays awake as others rest, he gives his group riddles and puzzles to occupy their minds and relieve their stress. His most iconic thing is creating framents that everyone can use to empower themselves or trinkets that empower him immensely.
I will do what i must.
Create a fragment of power or a trinket for this class.
This should help close your wounds.

Look at us, we are unstoppable!

They want me to do that!
I am not sure if now is the time.

I don't care about any of this.
There is no need for that.
I am exhausted, i need a moment.

I'm pretty sure this is a better idea.
I know what has to be done!
I have waited a long time for this.
I will win this battle for us.
Arcane arts are hard to execute.
I know what spell must be used.
This is better for the current situation.
I am not sure what to do.
I have to do something to stop this fear.
Be very careful, they are near.

More are waiting outside, we shouldn't retreat.
This needs to be our end!
This is where our path ends.
No, we need to stay and fight!
We are no cowards, fight on!
They knew what i was going to do?!
That cannot happen and somehow it did...
Get out of my way, i need some room.
This will almost certainly end badly...
There is no hope for us.
This is what you wanted, isn't it?
I knew that was going to happen...
How do you let that happen?
It's not smart to stay and fight, if we know the risk is high.
I know that they are up to something.
We are failing because of you!
I refuse to believe that just happened.
This is a very suspicious situation.
Can someone remind me why we are making the same mistakes twice.
We should move the other way.

I need some time to recover.

I know for a fact they are planning something.

L'Enigme porte une robe éthérique et un orbe contenant une puissance arcanique. Depuis, ses pouvoirs n'ont cessé de croître, au prix d'une malédiction transformant sa peau en pierre. Sa capacité à décupler les forces de ses alliés tout comme les effets de ses sorts permet au groupe de mener de longs combats.
La proximité de deux d'entre nous est dangereuse pour tous.
La proximité de deux d'entre nous est dangereuse pour tous.

Devinettes et puzzles ne sont pas les seuls atouts de l'Enigme. Ses differents pouvoirs sont versatiles : il peut en améliorer les effets ou soutenir les capacités défensives ou offensives de ses alliés avec.

L'Enigme est patiente et ne dort presque jamais. Il fait honneur à son nom en donnant des puzzles ou des devinettes au groupe, qui ressortent plus calme de l'exercice. Une chose unique à l'Enigme est la création soit de fragments de pouvoirs que tous peuvent utiliser, soit d'équipement le rendant plus puissant.
Crée un fragment de pouvoir ou une breloque spécifique à cette classe.
Cela devrait t'aider à panser tes blessures.
Tiens, je n'en n'ai pas besoin, je saigne à peine.
C'est pour toi, je ne m'en servirais pas.
En ma présence, tu auras le pouvoir de continuer.
Tu n'as pas à avoir peur ; Je suis là.
Ma protection ne nous fera pas défaut dans le danger !
Ne doute jamais de mon mysticisme !
Voyez ce qui peut être créé !
Une puissance infinie, à portée de main !
Un morceau de pouvoir, sous vos yeux !
Que votre peau soit de pierre !
Qu'est ce qui meurt en lui donnant de l'eau ? ... Un feu.
Qu'est ce qui se brise si elle n'est pas tenue ? ... Une promesse.
Vers où pouvez-vous aller sans jamais l'atteindre ? ... L'horizon.
Cela n'est pas digne de mon intérêt.
Je pense je vais plutôt méditer.

Rien de ce que je subis ne fera vaciller !

Ma force est la votre, servez-vous-en !

Je les sens, ils sont autour de nous.

Ce n'est même pas une égratinure !

Laissez faire quelqu'un qui sait faire !

Nous n'aurions jamais du venir ici.

Rien dans les mains, rien dans les poches !
Voici le coup du chapeau ! Ah, c'est vrai, je n'ai pas chapeau...
Je dois reculer, à cause de cette peur...
Je dois me calmer à l'arrière.
Ils approchent ! Je dois aller vers l'arrière.

Arkanista nosi eteryczne szaty i dzierży tajemną kulę, a gdy przez klątwę jego skóra zmieniła się w kamień, jego moc gwałtownie wzrosła. Wzmacnia siebie i kompanów, przez co grupa staje się potężniejsza wraz z upływem czasu.
Nie jest bezpiecznym trzymanie nas blisko siebie.
Sensu nie ma jego obecność tutaj.

Zagadki nie są jedyną rzeczą, w której Arkanista się specjalizuje. Używając swych mocy może zwiększyć defensywę i ofensywę drużyny. Jego umiejętności są bardzo wszechstronne, a ponadto wzmacniają się nawzajem.

Arkanista jest indywidualistą. Zawsze czuwa, gdy inni śpią, daje drużynie zagadki do rozwiązanie w celu uspokojenia ich i ukojenia stresu. Jego ikoniczną umiejętnością jest tworzenie odłamków, które mogą posłużyć do wzmocnienia kompanów lub błyskotek.
Stwórz odłamek mocy lub blyskotkę dla tej klasy.
Proszę, weź to. Ja nigdy nie krwawię
Przyjmij to, ja ich nie potrzebuję.
Tak długo jak tu jestem macie niesamowitą moc.
Nie musisz się bać tak długo, jak ja tu jestem.
Dobre zakończenie jest ze mną rzeczą pewną.
Tu nie ma miejsca na pomyłki. Ja nas obronię!
Nigdy nie wątpcie w moją magię!
What has a head and a tail, but no body?... A coin.
What gets broken without being held?... A promise.
What is always coming but never arrives?... Tomorrow.
Więcej z nich się tu pojawi.
Przyjście tu z wami było pomyłką.
Muszę się wycofać, to napięcie mnie przy.
Dam wam trochę czasu na odnowę.
Stanie tutaj nic nam nie da
Nie jestem w stanie się ruszyć.
Czemu ten strach tak mnie męczy?
Nie jestem pewien, czy czas teraz na to.
Tajemne sztuki nie są proste, potrzeba mi czasu.
Jestem pewien, że to lepszy pomysł.
O co tu tak naprawdę chodzi?
Sztuki tajemne są ciężkie, nawet dla mistyka.
Wiem jakie zaklęcie tu najlepiej zadziała.
To będzie lepsze w obecnej sytuacji.
Nie jestem pewien, co mam robić.
Muszę coś zrobić, by przestać się bać.
Świerzbi mnie, by rzucić więcej zaklęć.
Przyjście tu z wami to był zły pomysł.
Nie powinienem tu z wami być.
Bez mej magii wszyscy byście zginęli.
Myślę, że powinienem dowodzić swoją własną ekspedycją.
Myślę, że czas wrócić do Osady.
Uważaj, co mówisz stojąc przed mistykiem!
Zobaczmy, czy dacie radę mnie zranić!
Jestem zmęczony, już nie dam rady.
Czemu odchodzimy? Oni na to czekają!
Tam jest ich więcej, nie powinniśmy stąd wychodzić.
Wykończmy ich szybko i idźmy dalej!
Oni wiedzieli, co ja chcę zrobić?!
To nie może się dziać, ale się dzieje...
Zejdź mi z drogi, potrzebuję miejsca.
To się z pewnością źle skończy...
Nie jest mądrą dalsza walka, jeśli wiemy jak wysokie jest ryzyko.
Czy może mi ktoś wyjaśnić, dlaczego popełniamy te same błędy po raz kolejny?
Nie masz pojęcia gdzie idziemy, czyż nie?
To jest dokładnie to, czego chce wróg.
Nie trzeba... Koniec końców wynik będzie ten sam...
Nie czas na to, wróg nas otacza!
To i tak źle się skończy.
To jest złe miejsce na odpoczynek.
Ten dźwięk nie wróży nic dobrego.
Musimy się śpieczyć, walka na nas czeka.
Wiedziałem, że przyjście tu to zły pomysł.
Nie jestem co do tego pewien...
Czuję, że powinniśmy porzucić to zadanie.
Jestem pewien, że wrogowie coś planują.
Nie podoba mi się to, jak na mnie patrzysz.
Lubię wasz entuzjazm, ale to nic nie zmieni.
To JA jestem naszym powodem do przetrwania.
Najedzenie nie pomoże nam wygrać bitwy.
To nam nie pomoże, ani trochę.
